description: This simple chocolate cake recipe with layers of buttercream on the inside and crushed Cadbury Crunchie bars on the outside will satisfy any sweet tooth.
name: Easy Choc-Crunch Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt Betty Crocker Chocolate Fudge Cake Mixes

recipeInstructions.text: Crush chocolate bars and press over top and sides of cake. Drizzle with glaze. Slice and serve.
